item.title: Ukraine and Russia Begin Largest Exchange of Prisoners of War
item.description: Each side reported that 390 of its people had been returned, and more swaps are expected this weekend.

item.title: Trump Threatens 50% Tariff on E.U. and 25% Tariff on Apple

item.title: Bangladesh’s Leader Threatens to Resign Over Election Pressure
item.description: Muhammad Yunus has struggled to navigate between the army, career politicians and the protest movement that overthrew the country’s authoritarian lead...

item.title: New Studies Dismiss Signs of Life on Distant Planet
item.description: In April, astronomers said they had detected a possible signature of life on the exoplanet K2-18b. Now, three independent analyses discount the eviden...

item.title: In ‘Cancer Alley,’ a Battle Over Who Gets to Measure Air Pollution
item.description: Community groups are fighting an unusual Louisiana law that restricts how they use data from air-quality monitors, saying it violates free speech.
